CustomField.description: Days that the unit is past its return date. If negative, the unit is not due. Approved extensions will make this minus 30 days
CustomField.formula: if( text( Product_Status__c ) ='Closed' || text( Product_Status__c ) ='Written Off' || text( Product_Status__c ) ='Returned/Purchased' , 0, today() - New_Return_Date__c)
CustomField.label: Days Past Due
